```{r tstat-files, echo=FALSE, results="hide", warning=FALSE}
library("exams")
ex <- system.file("exercises", c("tstat.Rnw", "tstat.Rmd"), package = "exams")
file.copy(ex, to = getwd())
include_asset("tstat.Rnw", link = FALSE)
include_asset("tstat.Rmd", link = FALSE)

set.seed(1090)
Sweave("tstat.Rnw")
include_asset("tstat.tex", link = FALSE)
set.seed(1090)
knitr::knit("tstat.Rmd", quiet = TRUE, encoding = "UTF-8")
include_asset("tstat.md", link = FALSE)

set.seed(1090)
exams2html("tstat.Rnw", name = "blog", dir = ".")
file.rename("blog1.html", "tstat-Rnw.html")
include_asset("tstat-Rnw.html", engine = "firefox", link = FALSE, out = "tstat-Rnw-html.png")

set.seed(1090)
exams2html("tstat.Rmd", name = "blog", dir = ".")
file.rename("blog1.html", "tstat-Rmd.html")
include_asset("tstat-Rmd.html", engine = "firefox", link = FALSE, out = "tstat-Rmd-html.png")

set.seed(1090)
exams2pdf("tstat.Rnw", name = "blog", dir = ".")
file.rename("blog1.pdf", "tstat-Rnw.pdf")
include_asset("tstat-Rnw.pdf", link = FALSE, out = "tstat-Rnw-pdf.png")

set.seed(1090)
exams2pdf("tstat.Rmd", name = "blog", dir = ".")
file.rename("blog1.pdf", "tstat-Rmd.pdf")
include_asset("tstat-Rmd.pdf", link = FALSE, out = "tstat-Rmd-pdf.png")

system("convert -density 100 tstat-Rnw.pdf[0] -gravity northwest -chop 277x216 -gravity southeast -chop 250x753 -border 2x2 -bordercolor '#666666' tstat.small.png")
file.copy("tstat.small.png", "../../../images/", overwrite = TRUE)
```
